Singer(s): Udit Narayan, Sadhana Sargam, Kumar Sanu, Poornima

Song: Tere dum se hai mera dum ( dil se tumko chahenge ham)
Ek taraf hai  gharwali, ek taraf baharwali
Aankhon se tuney kya keh diya
Ajooba hai (phulon mein jo khushbu hai, kaise woh aati hai)
Hayé ré, hayé ré,  hayé Rabba

Singer(s): Udit Narayan, Alka Yagnik, Manpreet Akhtar

Song: Orh li chunariya terey naam ki
Mujh pe bhi jawani chhaee hai
Merey khwabon mein jo aaye (aayega, aayega, aayega saajan)
Tera rang balley-balley, tera roop  balley-balley (naiyon naiyon mainu dil tera)
